channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump ally who donated $130 million to pay troops amid shutdown revealed as reclusive billionaire heir: report
item.description: Timothy Mellon has been identified as the anonymous donor who gave $130 million to the Pentagon to pay troops during the government shutdown.

item.title: The Media Are Hamas’s Greatest Weapon

item.title: Trump hits Canada with an extra 10% duty because Ontario’s anti-tariff ad ran during the World Series and didn’t come down immediately

item.title: Trump slams report that says he will name ballroom after himself
item.description: President Trump said any reports that he intends to call the new ballroom after himself are "fake news."

item.title: Democrat Sherrill responds to DOJ election monitors in New Jersey governor's race
item.description: Mikie Sherrill said she will "ensure that we don't have any voter intimidation" in response to the DOJ sending election watchers to New Jersey.

item.description: It would be a colossal mistake for the president to glide into a war in South America for which he sought no public support or congressional buy-in.
